name: publish-artifact
description: This integration allows you to publish artifact for your application to ElectricFlow.
author: Electric Cloud

inputs.name: electricFlowService
inputs.label: ElectricFlow Service Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the ElectricFlow endpoint to use.

inputs.name: artifactPath
inputs.label: Artifact Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the location or path for the artifact files to be published to ElectricFlow. For e.g., MyProject/target-$(Build.BuildNumber).war.
Specify the name of the application artifact using the format <group_id>:<artifact_key>. For e.g., "com.example:helloworld".
inputs.label: Artifact Name
inputs.name: artifactName
artifactVersion
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the version of the application artifact. For e.g., you can specify 1.0 or 1.0-$(Build.BuildNumber) that is based on Visual Studio environment variable.
inputs.label: Artifact Version

inputs.name: repositoryName
inputs.label: Repository Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the name of the ElectricFlow Repository.
